meanings.definition: The total area of a plot of land.
meanings.sent1: The plottage of the field is five acres.
meanings.sent2: The real estate agent calculated the plottage of the entire property.
meanings.sent3: The farmer joked that the plottage of his land was big enough to fit a small village.
meanings.sent4: The plottage of the backyard seemed to stretch on forever.
meanings.sent5: The plottage of the garden was so vast that it felt like a mini forest.

meanings.definition: The act of combining multiple parcels of land into one larger parcel.
meanings.sent1: The plottage of the fields created a huge farm.
meanings.sent2: The developer's plottage of the lots resulted in a new shopping center.
meanings.sent3: The plottage of the properties was like putting together a giant puzzle.
meanings.sent4: The plottage of the land felt like merging different worlds into one.
meanings.sent5: The plottage of the parcels transformed the landscape into a unified whole.
